title: Guessing Game - Random Numbers & Loops
description: Build a complete guessing game combining random number generation, while loops, conditional logic, user feedback, and game flow control. Progress from generating random numbers to implementing a full interactive game with attempt tracking and replay functionality.
learningObjectives: Generate random numbers using the Random class
Implement while loops for indefinite iteration
Use conditional logic for user feedback
Implement nested loops for game replay
Combine multiple programming concepts into a complete program
Design user-friendly game flow and interactions
